original_title: Foschia pesci Africa sonno nausea fantasia
overview: The title is taken from the song Genova per noi by Paolo Conte Â© Universal Music Publishing Ricordi S.r.l.  Six words from a famous track by Paolo Conte, six stories of Ligurian boys and girls, who try to build up their lives in Liguria, dwelling among the difficulties in finding a way that may not be precarious works and uncertainty. The bottleneck imposed by the crisis coexists with the spreading vitality, despite all.
title: Foschia pesci Africa sonno nausea fantasia
